column4: ARGGGGGGGGGGGGG, ALSA will not work properly, and has yet to be fixed in about 8 months
can anyone help me troubleshoot please?>
for some reason, it just won't share audio amongst anything, and nothing seems to work without an error for ALSA showing up in term
ill ask again, what is the device ?
what hardware device are you using for your audio
what application are you using to 'test' your sound ?
yes i believe...here is the full problem...
when i open anything that utilizes audio it will work generally, (for an emulated ventrilo program, the mic sounds AWFUL ...but still works)...
but amarok/firefox/mplayer etc.. when i choose to use one, they will work as long as it is the first program to access audio after a restart
sorry, cannot help you, good luck
after that, they will not share/switch/ or work even if i close the first program that used it
